title: Research
text:
Work in progress

Hiped package for hierarchical interpolations, useful in multi-material density-based topology optimization.
Many other related things…

title: New position : Ass. Prof at CentraleSupélec
text: I’m pleased to announce that as of December 1, I’ll be taking up the position of Assistant Professor at CentraleSupélec. My research will be carried out in the GeePs laboratory.

title: Implementation of FEM on interpetable neural networks
text: Together with Dr. Alexandre Daby-Seesaram (École Polytechnique), we are looking for master students to implement the finite element method on interpretable neural network architectures. The internship description can be found here (in French).

title: Théodore Cherrière
text:
Welcome,
I’m Théodore Cherrière, a Postdoctoral researcher at RICAM.
I hold a Ph.D. in electrical engineering from the Paris-Saclay University (ENS Paris-Saclay), where I worked at the SATIE. My PhD thesis can be found here (in French). My main research interest consists of topology optimization of electrical machines.



CSMA 2024, Giens





PhD Thesis, p. 227

title: Keynote talk at CISTEM 2024
text:
I am honoured to give a keynote talk at IEEE CISTEM 2024 conference, entitled “Topology optimization of rotating electrical machines: state of the art and applications”.



Main amphitheater of ENSAM engineering school in Rabat, Morocco

title: Study of a new flux-switching machine
text: Together with Pr. Sami Hlioui (CY Cergy Paris University), we are looking for master students to study a new flux-switching machine found by topology optimization, potentially with a reduced quantity of rare earth permanent magnets. The detailed internship description can be found here (in French).

title: IEEE Magnetic Society webinar
text: I gave a IEEE Magnetic Society webinar entitled “Pushing creativity further in electrical machine design using topology optimization”.
